title: When they dont care about their own game
body:
Sad days I work 6 days a week my only day off is Saturday and this happens on my FAVORITE GAME MODE of the year.. please fix YOUR game that I have dropped money on thanks.

little side note tho, this has happen in the pass during championships they resolved it in under 45 minutes. SAD this has taken this long.

replies.body: Just opened launcher worked for me no problems best luck to you guys (AN NO I DIDNT RESET THE DAMN CLOCK LIKE ALL THESE OTHER FOOLS)

Lol that fucks with other games I Shouldn't have to do this an none of you should either don't stop to their level. Let them fix this problem just sad that this isn't championships otherwise it would be fix in under an hour... I'm just salty that its urf and its my only day off sorry all
Dude if you want to play the game don't bitch when someone finds a solution. If it fucks with other games set the clock back to the right date when you go to play. It takes 10 seconds to do.
Set your computers calendar back two days. Its weird but it worked for me
